“iOS and Android app made with React Native and Redux. It uses Asos' hackathon Api which provides only a search query. The goal was to see how many features I could implement with a minimal Api. This app is full of hacks”

ASOS STORE

“React Redux React-Router Redux-Thunk Webpack BEM. Look for the best recipes on the web with Spoonacular's api. Search by keyword or cuisine style.”

DELECIPES

“Almost immediately, word spread of a Welshman who had built this incredible sounding sub bass system, and soon enough audiophiles began searching out these legendary subs that were built like no other.”
